actions.name: New File
actions.description: Create a new file in the local file system or in iCloud. If neither the text parameter nor the snippet parameter is specified, the text to append will come from the clipboard.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the root folder.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the file to create. If a file with that name already exists, Textastic will append a number to the file name to make it unique. If not specified, a file name will be generated by Textastic.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to insert into the new file.

parameters.name: snippet
parameters.description: The snippet to insert. If both the ”snippet” and the ”text” parameter are present, only the ”snippet” parameter will be used.

actions.name: Open File
actions.description: Open an existing file in the local file system or in iCloud. If the file doesn’t exist, calls the url from the x-error parameter.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the root folder.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the file to open.

actions.name: Append
actions.description: Open an existing file or create a new file and append text. If neither the text parameter nor the snippet parameter is specified, the text to append will come from the clipboard.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the root folder.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the file to open. If the file doesn’t exist, it will be created.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to append to the file.

parameters.name: snippet
parameters.description: The snippet to append to the file. If both the ”snippet” and the ”text” parameter are present, only the ”snippet” parameter will be used.

actions.name: Replace
actions.description: Open an existing file or create a new file and replace its contents with the specified text. If neither the text parameter nor the snippet parameter is specified, the text to append will come from the clipboard.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The directory path. If not specified, defaults to the root folder.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the file to open. If the file doesn’t exist, it will be created.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to insert into the file after its contents are deleted.

parameters.name: snippet
parameters.description: The snippet to insert into the file after its contents are deleted. If both the ”snippet” and the ”text” parameter are present, only the ”snippet” parameter will be used.
